dependencies.description: Brotli is a generic-purpose lossless compression algorithm
dependencies.name: brotli

dependencies.description:
bzip2 is a freely available, patent free high-quality data compressor.
It typically compresses files to within 10% to 15% of the best available
techniques (the PPM family of statistical compressors), whilst being
around twice as fast at compression and six times faster at
decompression.
dependencies.name: bzip2

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: c

dependencies.description: Blosc, an extremely fast, multi-threaded, meta-compressor library
dependencies.name: c-blosc

dependencies.description:
CFITSIO is a library of C and Fortran subroutines for reading and
writing data files in FITS (Flexible Image Transport System) data
format.
dependencies.name: cfitsio

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: cxx

dependencies.description:
The GIFLIB project maintains the giflib service library, which has been
pulling images out of GIFs since 1989.
dependencies.name: giflib

dependencies.description:
MozJPEG is a patched version of libjpeg-turbo which improves JPEG
compression efficiency achieving higher visual quality and smaller file
sizes at the same time
dependencies.name: jpeg

dependencies.description:
JPEG XR is a still image format based on technology originally developed
by Mirosoft under the name HD Photo (formerly Windows Media Photo). The
JPEG XR format is similar, but not identical, to the HD Photo/Windows
Media Photo format.
dependencies.name: jxrlib-debian

dependencies.description:
Little cms is a color management library. Implements fast transforms
between ICC profiles. It is focused on speed, and is portable across
several platforms (MIT license).
dependencies.name: lcms

dependencies.description:
Libaec provides fast lossless compression of 1 up to 32 bit wide signed
or unsigned integers (samples). It implements Golomb-Rice compression
method under the BSD license and includes a free drop-in replacement for
the SZIP library.
dependencies.name: libaec

dependencies.description:
Heavily optimized library for DEFLATE/zlib/gzip compression and
decompression
dependencies.name: libdeflate

dependencies.description:
LibLZF is a very small data compression library. It consists of only two
.c and two .h files and is very easy to incorporate into your own
programs. The compression algorithm is very, very fast, yet still
written in portable C.
dependencies.name: liblzf

dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.
dependencies.name: libpng

dependencies.description:
libspng (simple png) is a C library for reading and writing Portable
Network Graphics (PNG) format files with a focus on security and ease of
use.
dependencies.name: libspng

dependencies.description: LibTIFF - Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Library and Utilities.
dependencies.name: libtiff

dependencies.description:
WebP is a modern image format that provides superior lossless and lossy
compression for images on the web. Using WebP, webmasters and web
developers can create smaller, richer images that make the web faster.
dependencies.name: libwebp

dependencies.description:
OpenJPEG is an open-source JPEG 2000 codec written in C language. It has
been developed in order to promote the use of JPEG 2000, a still-image
compression standard from the Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG).
Since April 2015, it is officially recognized by ISO/IEC and ITU-T as a
JPEG 2000 Reference Software.
dependencies.name: openjpeg

dependencies.description: Filter for improving compression of typed binary data.
dependencies.name: py-bitshuffle

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.
dependencies.name: py-wheel

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description: A fast compressor/decompressor: https://code.google.com/p/snappy
dependencies.name: snappy

dependencies.description:
XZ Utils is free general-purpose data compression software with high
compression ratio. XZ Utils were written for POSIX-like systems, but
also work on some not-so-POSIX systems. XZ Utils are the successor to
LZMA Utils.
dependencies.name: xz

dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.
dependencies.name: zlib

dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
dependencies.name: zlib-api

dependencies.description:
Zopfli Compression Algorithm is a compression library programmed in C to
perform very good, but slow, deflate or zlib compression.
dependencies.name: zopfli

dependencies.description:
Zstandard, or zstd as short version, is a fast lossless compression
algorithm, targeting real-time compression scenarios at zlib-level and
better compression ratios.
dependencies.name: zstd

dependent_to.description:
A generalist algorithm for cell and nucleus segmentation that can be
optimized for your own data
dependent_to.name: cellpose

description:
Imagecodecs is a Python library that provides block-oriented, in-memory
buffer transformation, compression, and decompression functions for use
in the tifffile, czifile, zarr, and other scientific image input/output
modules..
name: py-imagecodecs

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
